ItemDesc: Upon use, immediately heals one ally for <unbreak>10</unbreak> HP.
ItemBGDesc: A simple remedy made by grinding blue maple deer antler, sprout combination remedy, and droppings from blue-winged squirrels into powder, then kneading them with honey to form pills. It has some healing effects, but not significant. "Your medicine's effectiveness... is it any different from a bowl of brown sugar water?" "Of course it is. Brown sugar water is sweet, while my medicine is as spicy as drinking boiling water."
